channel.title: signal processing on Prisca Rakotomanga
channel.description: Recent content in signal processing on Prisca Rakotomanga

item.title: Project 1: Source separation
item.description: Problem statement : Data src : spectres acquis Approach : Matlab Results: qq images Rakotomanga P., Soussen C., Khairallah G., Amouroux M., Zaytsev S., Genina E., Chen H., Delconte A., Daul C., Tuchin V. and Blondel W. (2019) \Source separation approach for the analysis of spatially resolved multiply excited autofluorescence spectra during optical clearing of ex vivo skin." Biomedical Optics Express, 10(7):364338 Plus value : savoir le poid des fluorophores présents dans la peau et les séparer des fluorophores induits (exogenes)
